credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Design for Victory holding a Wreath and Trumpet and Studies for Various Decorations
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray-brown wash over black chalk on laid paper
description: At left, in right triangle, winged female genius, seated beside candelabrum, raises wreath with right hand and holds trumpet in lowered left hand.  At upper right, in semicircle, two seated figures on either side of ? with inscription above:  Fondi delli semicercole cinabro o verde; in rectangle below, two figures, one seated, one standing with inscription above:  Fondo del quadro del trionfo della/ Guerra azzuro figure color/ li altri camei son cinabro verde e/ nero; in rectangle below, sketch of triumphant Peace with inscription above:  Fondo del quadro della Pace trionfo verde altri camei tu/ rchino nero e rosso bucaro.
name: Drawing
